SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwDAMolagBalStatueScript

short speech
float timer

begin onactivate
	
	if GetStage fbmwDAMolagbal < 10
		set speech to 1
	elseif GetStage fbmwDAMolagbal == 20
		set speech to 8
	endif
end

begin gamemode

	if GetStage fbmwDAMolagbal >= 30
		return
	endif

	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )

	if timer <= 0
		if GetStage fbmwDAMolagbal < 10
			if speech == 1
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 2
			elseif speech == 2
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 3
			elseif speech == 3
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 4
			elseif speech == 4
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 5
			elseif speech == 5
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 6
			elseif speech == 6
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 7
			elseif speech == 7
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwDAMolagbal 10
				player.AddItem 0keyumentauna 1
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAMolagbal == 20
			if speech == 8
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 9
			elseif speech == 9
				set timer to mwShrineOfMolagBalREF.Say mwDAMolagBalSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 10
			elseif speech == 10
				EnablePlayerControls
				player.AddItem 0macesofsmolagsbaluunique 1
				SetStage fbmwDAMolagbal 30
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 230 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
